exceptions.tactic: induction t; simpl; try rewrite IHt; try destruct (arity L (inr f)); reflexivity.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language f : Functions L n : nat t : fol.Term L t0 : fol.Terms L n IHt : subAllTerms n t0 (fun x : nat => fol.var L x) = t0 Unable to unify "Tcons L n t t0" with "Tcons L n (subAllTerm t (fun x : nat => fol.var L x)) t0".

original: intros t. induction t using fol.Term_ind. - reflexivity. - simpl. f_equal. induction t; simpl; try rewrite IHt; try destruct (arity L (inr f)); reflexivity.
